TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NgramExtractorTransform extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A transform that turns a collection of tokenized text (vector of ReadOnlyMemory), or vectors of keys into numerical feature vectors. The feature vectors are counts of ngrams (sequences of consecutive *tokens* -words or keys- of length 1-n).
